title: BTSC Notification 2025 - Apply Online for 2809 Junior Engineer Posts
description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 2809 Junior Engineer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed theirÂ Diploma in Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical Engineering can apply for the BTSC Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode.
